query: SELECT ld.id, ld.userId as diary_userId, ld.title, p.id as persona_id, p.userId as persona_userId FROM learning_diaries ld LEFT JOIN ai_personas p ON ld.userId = p.userId;
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user VqBKoEwKfw4feq4.6cd8cd1ff95f --database aavW9BLbZ6sZHaPEemayyD --execute SELECT ld.id, ld.userId as diary_userId, ld.title, p.id as persona_id, p.userId as persona_userId FROM learning_diaries ld LEFT JOIN ai_personas p ON ld.userId = p.userId;
